Do you want a Search Engine Optimization BOOST?

Looking for an SEO Agency that can help you achieve your growth goals? We get you results using proven and tested blueprints that work. Digital marketing or SEO can be tedious. But for you, that’s where we come in. As digital marketing experts and as an SEO specialist in Houston, we provide strategies that get leads and make sales. You’ll receive the best digital marketing and SEO strategies to hit your 10X goals. From WordPress web design and SEO to digital marketing and video/YouTube tactics – we have ROI-driven blueprints designed to help you succeed.

Free SEO Website Audit

Would you like a complimentary SEO Website Audit? Just provide a few details, and you’ll be on your way to boosting your online visibility. Our SEO audits are designed to separate YOU from your competition. If you want to level up your search engine optimization, a detailed audit is the best place to start. Our strategic SEO audits begin with an analysis of your technical SEO. We’ll identify any issues and set you up for success. After technical and on-page SEO, we’ll provide you with a comprehensive report on your keywords, keyword gaps with your competitors, and backlinksThe best way to start is with a comprehensive SEO audit. Connect with us today.  

Want higher rankings?

Grow your business, increase your exposure, and get found. At MetricsMule, we’re the #1 Houston SEO company, but our proven blueprint works for anyone, anywhere, in any industry. We’ll analyze your website and your competitor’s website and find the important keywords to increase your visibility. 

Video SEO has become crucial and is now prioritized by search engines like Google. The first page of search results often includes videos. We’ll create and optimize your videos to get found in Google and YouTube.

On-page SEO includes optimizing your website with great content, and keywords, using the correct tags and titles, creating helpful YouTube videos, and blogs, internal linking, and more. You’ll love your new site.

Your website needs to be optimized so you’ll be found. We’ll do this by strategically optimizing each page of your website and metadata with H1’s, title tags, alt tags, video, etc. See more about technical SEO.

Popular search terms include “find local businesses near me” or searching by your zip code. We’ll help you dominate your local market by increasing your search presence locally, including a Google My Business Local SEO page. 

Not only are we a Houston SEO agency, but we’re a full social media marketing company as well. Boost your exposure on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and more.

If you’re not using awesome ChatGPT Prompts for SEO, you’re already behind. We’re experts in ChatGPT prompt engineering. Just check out our blog page to see exaclty how we’re using ChatGPT.

SEO Consultant

How You Benefit From SEO Services

Here are a few ways you’ll benefit from partnering with an SEO expert.

  • Website Audit

  • Monthy SEO

  • Website SEO Optimization

Not all SEO companies are the same.

Click to see a sample of our popular SEO packages

Advanced Keyword Research

What is keyword research, and how do you do it?

Keyword research is the starting block for SEO. This is where you perform comprehensive research on what specific keywords are essential to you and your business and implement a strategy to get found in the search results when people search. For example: Let’s say someone is searching for an automotive body shop. They might type something like “automotive body shop,” automotive body shop near me,” or “body shop with your city or zip code.”  They might even search for something like this: “how to choose the right body shop for my vehicle.” Regardless of the searched keywords, we want to ensure you are found on the first page! We use the best tools (in our opinion) like Semrush, Ahrefs, Keyword Finder, vidIQ, KWfinder and more.  And we’ll do all the work. 

Keyword Strategy

Having a keyword strategy is paramount to your SEO success. They’re the building blocks for any SEO blueprint.

  • Your Business

    Pick the keywords that mean the most to you and we’ll optimize them so you’ll get found.

  • Your Competition

    Not only will we research your keywords, we’ll research and create detailed reports of your competition’s keywords.

  • Your Strategy

    You’ll have the perfect blueprint and we’ll implement the perfect strategies for you to grow with SEO.

SEO Important Features

Want to rank higher and increase your visibility and traffic?  Look no further. MetricsMule specializes in SEO, helping you grow your business.  You’ll discover where you rank online, what keywords people use to find you and how your competitors compare. We’ll use all of that data to develop specific SEO strategies to expand your footprint and build your brand to higher levels. 

Here are just a few of many ways.

Blog, Video, Social Media

Content

Blogs, Video

It’s important to consistently add new content. Blogs and video creation are a great way. Google recently made top videos a priority to appear on the first page of search results. We know how to create the perfect content. See more about on-page SEO. 

Your Website Strategy

Website

Website Optimization

Is your website optimized and set up for SEO? Most are not and this can hurt. It’s crucial to make sure each page on your website is optimized so you’ll be found in online search results. See more about website optimization and technical SEO. 

Optimization

Keywords

How do people find you?

Keyword Research is the key to appearing on the first page of search results. We have the best tools and methods to increase your online presence by targeting specific keywords related to you. 

Why Does SEO Matter?

If you’re in the automotive repair industry it is crucial to have a good SEO strategy and rank high when people search with keywords related to you. This industry is more competitive than ever so it’s important to stand out in your respective, local market. What happens when someone searches online for “body shop or collision repair near me”.  Will you show up?  Or how about “body shop (your zip code)”. Will you appear on the first page of the search results? If you do, great. If you don’t, we’ll make that happen. But even if you are appearing on the first page, are customers choosing you or your competitor?

Here’s an example: Let’s say you own an automotive body shop, repair shop, or collision center. You can even be a mobile technician or mechanic. How do you stand out in a very saturated market? How do you compete against the “bigger guys” in a small pond? How do you grow? We have the answers because we’ve done it. And we’ve done it at massive growth levels! Let’s do the same for you. 

How You’ll Grow Your Automotive Business or Repair Shop…

There are many ways we’ll improve your online visibility. In addition to the 4 key areas listed below, we’ll also implement Analytics, build keyword strategies and databases, create or optimize your social media accounts, get you more backlinks and create informative and engaging YouTube videos. 

SEO Friendly Website

Each page and every blog post needs to be optimized for SEO. When people search with your targeted keywords, you will be found and gain new customers.

Local SEO

You need a “Google My Business Page”.  This is separate from your website and is extremely important. You’ll appear on the first page of search when people search with terms such as “body shop near me”.

Keyword Research

One of the most important SEO strategies is knowing your keywords, your competitor’s keywords, and where you rank online when people search with those terms. We’ll do all of this and build amazing databases with all the stats.

Organic, PPC, Ads

To be the most successful you need to have all of this. Organically appear in search results with great content, create engaging Ads and choose your keyword bid strategies.

How long to these SEO packages last?

SEO done correctly takes time. You can lose your SEO progress overnight (literally), but it takes strategic planning and implementation to solidify a top-ranking page in online search results. We recommend and provide four SEO package tiers:

3 months

This is the recommended minimum length to see some SEO improvements. 

6 months

You’ll see an increase in not only new content, but older, optimized webpages. 

12 months

Optimal SEO performance and a significant increase in page rankings and online visibility.

Indefinitely

After 12 months, keep going to receive SEO concierge support, skyrocketing rankings and overtaking your competitors.
